name: Scarlet Heels
description:
Private Investigator Marion is acting as a consultant for the police today. Well, in this case, it's mostly to interview a troupe of dancers, most of whom are attending the local all-girls academy. A peculiar incident has happened at their dance theater, and it only gets stranger from then on.

Short mystery (and mild horror) visual novel. Roughly 3k words.

Music can be found here.

For Magical Girl Game Jam #3.

Made with monogatari.io.
